name: WKImage
desc: A wrapper for images you use with a picker interface.

items.name: init(image: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates and returns an image object using the specified UIKit image.

items.name: init(imageData: Data)
items.desc: Creates an image with the specified raw image data.

items.name: init(imageName: String)
items.desc: Creates an image by loading an image file from the Watch app bundle.

items.name: var imageData: Data?
items.desc: The data object containing the raw image data.
